text: Reconstructor is a program that allows anyone to customize an ISO image of Ubuntu. ==Features== *Ability to change the Boot image, Boot Progress Splash (usplash), wallpaper, Gnome Splash Screen, GDM theme, and other settingshttp://reconstructor.aperantis.com/index.php?option=com_content&task;=view&id;=29&Itemid;=39 *Ability to add software to new compilationhttp://reconstructor.aperantis.com/gallery/ *Ability to enable all the repositories and add custom ones *Integrated option to burn the iso ==Related pages== *remastersys, a similar program *Ubuntu Customization Kit ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Website *Download reconstructor category:Software
title: Reconstructor
